casebody.data:
EUGENE TUCKER BUILDERS, INC., and Eugene Tucker
v.
FORD MOTOR COMPANY. No. 86P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2006. W. Gene Sigmon, Newton, for Tucker Builders. M. Keith Kapp, Kevin W. Benedict, Raleigh, for Ford Motor Company.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 21st day of February 2006 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of April 2006."
